in_play_description:
When played and when the Round ends: The character gains 1 Bond of Life stack.
Before both sides choose their actions: If the character to which this is attached does not have Bond of Life attached, then generate 1 random basic Elemental Die, and the character will deal +1 DMG the next time they deal DMG. (Once per Round)
